message.body: Hey guys - due to all the chamber choir conflicts, we we won't be performing at the PDA conference. Enjoy the afternoon and I'll see you tonight!
But it's just Vijay, James, Ricky, Ryan, and I. I'm sure if you sing songs without TB it'll be fine
Matt won't be able to make it either, so I don't think it'll work. Thanks for the suggestion, though!
But we can't back out of a commitment at the last minute just so Matt can go watch his girlfriend's concert! Or did we cancel last week?
We never said that we could perform. It's just taken a while for me to finalize that given the group's conflicts
Oh okay no problem then xD sorry
